bug.author: gpang
bug.summary: Attaching a UDB with many tables issues too many UDB RPCs in parallel
bug.description: Alluxio Version: 2.2.0 Describe the bug When you attach a UDB that has many tables, syncing the UDB creates many parallel threads issuing commands/RPCs to the UDB. This has the potential to overload and stress the UDB too much. To Reproduce Attach a UDB that has a many tables (1000+) and monitor the connections to the UDB. Expected behavior The expectation is to be able to limit the parallelism of the sync, to limit the load to the UDB. Urgency This is critical to be able to attach large databases.
